description:
The Four Benevolent Beasts argue over a meal about who is older and how well they are aging. Meanwhile, Hozuki has some problems of his own down in Hell.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La bande de bon augure / Les yôkai excentriques
The Auspicious Alliance / Quirky Off-the-Wall Creatures
瑞兆連盟 / エキセントリック不思議妖怪
